00042 template<class T>
00043 class Iterator : public virtual Object {
00044 public:
00049     typedef T Type;
00050 public:
00051 
00060     inline Iterator(const Iterable<T> & it) {}
00061 
00062     #ifndef SYLPH_DOXYGEN
00063     inline virtual ~Iterator() {}
00064     #endif
00065 
00071     virtual bool hasNext() const;
00080     virtual const T & next() const;
00087     virtual bool hasPrevious() const;
00096     virtual const T & previous() const;
00097 
00105     virtual void front() const;
00106 
00117     virtual void back() const;
00118 
00126     virtual std::idx_t nextIndex() const;
00127 
00135     virtual std::idx_t previousIndex() const;
00136 
00144     virtual void set(T & t);
00145 
00152     virtual void insert(T & t);
00158     virtual void remove();
00159 
00163     const T& operator++() const { return next(); }
00164 
00168     const T& operator--() const { return previous(); }
00169 
00173     const T& operator++(int) const { return next(); }
00174 
00178     const T& operator--(int) const { return previous(); }
00179 };

00189 class s_foreach_container_fjAk8tb1 : public s_foreach_container_base_7tQmTc4i {
00190     public:

00192     const T c;
00193     mutable int brk;
00194     typename T::Iterator i;
00195     inline bool condition() const { return (!brk++ && i.hasNext()); }
00196 };

00209 #define sforeach(variable,container) \
00210 for (s_foreach_container_base_7tQmTc4i & _##container##_ = \
00211          s_foreach_container_new(container); \
00212          sf_cast(_##container##_,container)->condition(); )               \
00213         for (variable = sf_cast(_##container##_, container)->i++; \
00214          sf_cast(_##container##_, container)->brk; \
00215              --sf_cast(_ #container#_, container)->brk)
